testcase.name: As a user I login to ASK application with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I open the url "http://ask-qa.portnov.com/"...........................passed When I type suteneko@rapidbeos.net in the email textbox.....................passed And I type test123 in the password textbox..................................passed And I click the Sign-In button..............................................passed And I wait for 2 seconds....................................................passed Then I should see the Home link in the side navigation menu.................passed And I click the Logout link from the side navigation menu...................passed

testcase.name: As a user I should not login to ASK application with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I open the url "http://ask-qa.portnov.com/"...........................passed When I type sutesneko@rapidbeosd.net in the email textbox...................passed And I type test1456 in the password textbox.................................passed And I click the Sign-In button..............................................passed And I wait for maximum of 10 seconds until the error message is displayed...passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed
